sources.note: Main website (redirected from mdcharts.net). Overview of product, specialties served, key features including scheduling, billing, patient intake, charting, mobile app. Testimonial from 9+ year user. Located in Great Neck, NY.

Product overview and compliance page. Lists ONC Complete EHR certification, CHPL listing 11214. Features include BiopsyMapping, InstaPath, e-prescribing, lab ordering, MIPS tracking, QR code chart updates. Links to separate mandatory disclosure page at mraemr.com. Serves dermatology, OBGYN, pediatrics, cardiology, urology.
Mandatory disclosures page â€” ECONNREFUSED, server unreachable at time of research.

EHR feature page. Customizable templates, e-prescribing from any screen, secure data exchange, SwiftDat dashboards, Peak Charge Capture, MIPS collection, lab integration with 20+ labs (LabCorp, Quest, BioReference). Telehealth from chart. Pediatric growth/immunization tracking.

DermCharts (dermatology-specific) page. BiopsyMapping, InstaPath biopsy tracking, instant image upload, Smart Super Bill, e-prescribing to 50,000+ pharmacies. Integrates EHR + PM + RCM. 18,000+ insurers supported.

Practice management features. Centralized billing with built-in clearinghouse, 99% first-pass acceptance, C-Track real-time claims panel, patient account ledger, 300+ reports plus custom report builder, real-time eligibility verification, advanced inventory control, text-to-pay collections.
RCM features. Integrated charge capture, 99% first-pass rate on 3M+ CCI edits, electronic claims, payment posting, denial appeal management, A/R reporting, gross vs net revenue analytics.
Company mission page. Designed by physicians and software architects. Physician-focused, specialty-specific. Based in Great Neck, NY. No founding date or detailed history provided here.
Health Records feature page. Health Records ID physical card for emergency access. Automated data sync for lab results, imaging, notes. Cloud-based secure storage. Patient-controlled sharing.

Management team page. Aaron Wachspress (CTO, founder, 35+ years experience, previously founded Universal EHR Solutions). Mago Saldana (Senior Business Analyst, 150+ EHR implementations). Jacqueline Lally (Senior Revenue Cycle Manager, 8+ years medical billing). Small team.

Blog post on dermatology features. Specialty templates for skin conditions, lesion details, biopsy reports, treatment plans. Integrated image management. Automated coding suggestions, e-prescribing, lab integration, dermatology-specific order sets. Analytics for diagnosis trends, treatment outcomes, medication usage.

FindEMR profile. Cloud-based EHR and PM for ambulatory practices. 100+ customizable templates. Serves dermatology, pediatrics, OB-GYN, cardiology, hematology/oncology, internal medicine, gastroenterology, pulmonology. Patient portal, billing, e-prescriptions, telemedicine, MIPS.
Blog post noting MD Charts ranked in top 12 dermatology EMRs. Referenced via search results.
LinkedIn profile. 11-50 employees, privately held, Great Neck NY. Founded 2002. Referenced via search results (not fetched directly).
